name: Sudoku Classic Daily Puzzle
description:
Classic Sudoku for all players from beginners to advanced.
Now your favorite game is always with you.

Train your brain or just relax with a classic game.
Features presented in the Sudoku Classic League make your game easy to play on any device: notes, auto-check, highlight duplicates and hints.

Sudoku is presented cleanly and easy to read.

You have access to 4000+ unique boards of different level. Each puzzle has only one solution.

Other Remarkable Features:

• Daily Challenges with unique trophies
• 8 Rule Customizations. Play like you want!
• Make notes! Each time you play a number your notes update automatically
• 5 themes designed for comfortable playing including "Night Theme" for dark rooms
• Hints help you keep playing

Play Sudoku anywhere, anytime and have fun!

No IAP! Completely Free
